page.title: 11ADULT LIFE STYLES
page.content: 6. 36s TO 50s. This group was the largest questioned. Nearly all are married and British, the men professional people, working in London or locally and travelling by car. The women who work are teachers, nurses or secretaries.They are highly educated, most with 'A'-levels, degrees and postgraduate diplomas. The majority live in owner-occupied 4-bedroom detached houses with 2 bathrooms, 1 man has stables, tennis court and swimming pool. Most households own a TV,video, hi-fi, freezer, washing machine, tumble dryer,fridge, more than 2 telephones,a home computer and 2 cars (5 have car telephones).Golf is a popular sport and also keep-fit, swimming and tennis. They take >2 weeks holiday,mainly abroad. Spare time is spent on gardening and DIY or on work. 1/4 do some voluntary work.
